scripts.build-js-lib: ngzip jquery.min.js > ../data/jquery.min.js.gz & ngzip jquery.touchSwipe.min.js > ../data/jquery.touchSwipe.min.js.gz & ngzip ajaxloader.js > ../data/ajaxloader.js.gz & ngzip bootstrap.min.js > ../data/bootstrap.min.js.gz & ngzip export-data.js > ../data/export-data.js.gz & ngzip exporting.js > ../data/exporting.js.gz & ngzip highstock.js > ../data/highstock.js.gz & ngzip dialog.js > ../data/dialog.js.gz
scripts.build-js: ngzip scripts.js > ../data/scripts.js.gz & ngzip dtoReceiver.js > ../data/dtoReceiver.js.gz & ngzip plot.js > ../data/plot.js.gz
scripts.build-htm: html-minifier index.htm --output ../data/index.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier distillation.htm --output ../data/distillation.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier reflux.htm --output ../data/reflux.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier brewing.htm --output ../data/brewing.htm --collapse-whitespace & html-minifier heater.htm --output ../data/heater.htm --collapse-whitespace
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-htm
